name: ai-video-analyzer
description: A fully local AI desktop application for video analysis with transcription, summarization, and chat capabilities

scripts.setup: npm run setup:backend && npm run setup:frontend
scripts.setup:backend: cd backend && python -m venv venv && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.start:frontend: cd frontend && npm run tauri dev
scripts.build: cd frontend && npm run tauri build
scripts.test: cd backend && python -m pytest && cd ../frontend && npm test

author: AI Video Analyzer Team
